title: Logging onto chat service...
body:
Logging onto chat service... it says on lol client!
I can't log in on my chat at lol. And the problem seems to be only for me
Some tips`?

replies.body:
Found something on Reddit that helped me. Followed the instructions below, which didn't work though when I turned the service back on again and tried loading the client one more time it worked! Fingers crossed for you guys!  
windows key + r
type in "services.msc"
go to: ip helper
shut it down

This worked for me. Pressing stop on IP helper in services.Msc, launched LOL up again, still can't connect to chat, went back to services.Msc and pressed start on IP helper, Launched LOL up again, everything working as normal. Thanks bro. Weird how this fixes it.
idk who you are but have my babies pls
This worked for me!! Thank u so much.
Worked for me also, thanks!
Yo dude probs to you man THANK YOU! it worked for me{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
worked for me too, thank you!
this worked for me ty
Worked for me. Relaunching IP helper did it. Thanks a lot.

The thing I did was to make it stop I downloaded the app "LoL Friends" off the google play store, logged into my account there where it showed the chats and logged off actual league, then logged out of "LoL Friends" logged back into League and it was fine. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

IT FUCKING WORKED

i fucking love you man #muchhomo{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
You need to know this worked for me too! after logging in/off, troubleshooting, changing dates, this is what actually worked! thanks bro!
LOVE YOU :***** THANK YOU
I love you dude {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
doesn't work here either...seems like rito is ignoring us -,-'
How are they ignoring you? A rioter has already said they're working on it, but they don't have any information. Maybe read before you come to conclusions..

It sounds like your network is having trouble connnecting to our chat servers, but have no fear!  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a few steps to get back into chat.  That should do the trick!
it doesn't, i've never had that problem before and after small update yesterday (?) i can sometimes connect, sometimes not everything else work fine (game, in-game chat)
Thanks for the info!  I've seen a few reports on this where some players can't connect to chat, and tracking the issue.  In the meantime, troubleshooting can still help some players as well!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eb12aqUF,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-08-17T17:10:15.399+0000)
>
> Thanks for the info!  I've seen a few reports on this where some players can't connect to chat, and tracking the issue.  In the meantime, troubleshooting can still help some players as well!

also it's not that we're getting disconnect from chat, we're connecting forever, stuck with "logging onto chat service..."
This is happening to me a as well

Yep, I've had this issue too. I've been talking with player support for two weeks now. I've done literally everything they've suggested, opened ports, changed firewall settings, everything - still not fixed. I can't see my friends online, invites, my chat, anything. Have to rely on the app on my phone for LoL messages. Super annoying.

So you haven't been playing for two weeks?!
I can see that this is mostly an EUW problem currently..
Hi guys today i changed language from it to en and then again from en to it and it works. but now i'm stucked again with the connection problem and language changing doesn't work anymore
Yeah it's not working for me either, it sucks {{champion:83}}
Everything in the game works, Store, I can play games, in game chat works, but not the chat on the client, can't access to friends

... ive been having that for days and randomly connects then disconnects
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Don`t Worry, If you want to play with your friends. Just invite them through  the online searchbar :D
Yeah fantastic. Except it is bug they need to fix and I would like to see who is online before I invite people.
Nothing has worked for me.  Please fix this.

Only thing that helps me with this ( ive been strugling for last few months with this and was fine for like a month and now its back again) was logging in, then out , then chnaging the date on pc, then log in again and this would log me in to the chat but with wrong date... at least i can communicate with team .... or invite people ... its well annoying. !

Jesus.. I have tried everything and nothing is working.. Still stucked with the same shit. "Logging onto chat services"
It's going on that way forever.. What should i do, nothing is working. I have never had that issue before
Yep worked for me. i had the app but never used it. i logged in, logged out , restarted LOL and all fine. tyvm

ok we have tried to log in and we cant we have tried everything and nothing is working please help. this is the message i keep getting.

Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

i was in a game when this all happened me and my husband will it count against us if no one else go kicked out of the game and they reported us?

I fixed it this way:
1. Switched Wifi to my phone 4g, so basically changed network and it went online.
2. After few mins switch back to ur main Wifi and it should work.

Peace

Thanks everyone for the updates, and helping each other out!  We now have a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) ticker on this issue, and will be providing updates as they come in.  Hang tight!
same
It worked for me. Thanks Alot!

I tried this and it worked:

went into game folder and then: RADS > projects > lol_air_client > releases > 0.0.1.212 > deploy > logs

and deleted every log. and voila - it works!!!
same problem fix it please this is ridiculous, tried all the solutions here only happened after small patch yesterday ... ,maybe it wold be more appropriate to have a euw riot employ reply to this
jup, same problem... can't play with friends {{champion:32}}
Well guys, idc about this issue cuz i dont have any friends to play with anyway {{champion:32}} {{summoner:3}} {{item:3151}}
I have this exact same problem!  Please Riot, need a solution.  Want to play with friends! :P
Having the same issue, tried loads of fixes but none of them work
Yeah, same here.
Same here. Still not working, haven't been working for couple of days... perfectly fine before then.
I am also having this issue, the only thing left to do is to uninstall and reinstall... {{item:3073}}
I have the same issue, I've tried several restarts and logging in and out, no avail, 'Logging onto chat service'

FIXED: Before clicking 'LAUNCH' go to the cog wheel in the top right, untick 'peer to peer'
May be a fluke, but fixed the problem for me
